## Decisions.Candidate.compare() method

Compare two [candidates](./ts-res.decisions.icandidate.md) for sorting purposes.

**Signature:**

```typescript
static compare(c1: ICandidate, c2: ICandidate): number;
```

</td><td>

[ICandidate](./ts-res.decisions.icandidate.md)


</td><td>

The second candidate to compare.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

number

A negative number if c1 should come before c2, a positive number if c1 should come after c2, or zero if they are equivalent.
